price: 53. Mpe na mawa na biso topesaki ye ndeko waye Háruna azala lokola ntoma.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحۡمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ نَبِيّٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu min raḥmatinā akhāhu hārūna nabiyyan
